question: You are leaving your job and would like to invite your friend to replace you. Write a letter to your friend.In your letter, you should:-describe the job-explain the reason you are leaving-tell him/her why you would recommend the job to them.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am incredibly sorry not to have been in touch with you recently. Life has been a bit hectic. My reason for contacting you is that I would like to recommend you to replace my position as an accountant in my current accounting firm.

As you may have known, my current responsibility is helping clients to declare various taxes, ranging from individual tax to capital gain tax. Additionally, this job also requires several client-based tasks as you need to know your clients’ financial issues.

The reason why I have decided to leave this firm is that I got my CPA license last month. I reckon it is a great time to move to a further step in my career. I will be finding other organizations whose business scopes are auditing and financial planning.

I think you are extremely suitable for this work as you have told me you would love to find an accounting job with basic tasks to enter this field. Furthermore, you have been equipped with a wide range of accounting knowledge since we have learned it in university, so this is a wonderful opportunity for you to enhance your practical skills.
I am looking for your reply. Drop me a line.
